attributes.action: Primary legislation for cats to be part of the provision of section 170
attributes.additional_details: So cats are given the same protection as dogs , and to make it a legal requirement to report a accident involving a cat
attributes.background:
Cats are not classed as domestic pets but yet dogs are , despite dogs been working animals for the police , the blind , farmers etc , so why is it not possible to bring cats into section 170 and offer them the same protection as dogs 
Cats are only covered under the the highway code

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637301
